Package actions.targeters.interfaces

Interface PointLike

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Targetable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicTarget, DominationPointTarget, TileTarget
    public interface PointLike
extends Targetable

    • Method Detail

      • location

        TileUID location​(Sandbox sandbox)
        Parameters:
        sandbox - the sandbox on which to evaluate the function
        Returns:
        the current location of the PointLike target

      • tilesSeen

        java.util.Set<TileUID> tilesSeen​(Sandbox sandbox)
        This is a selector, it generates a list of tiles the current PointLike target can see
        Parameters:
        sandbox - the sandbox on which to evaluate the function
        Returns:
        a Collection of TileUIDs without duplicates

      • reachableSelector

        default java.util.Set<TileUID> reachableSelector​(Sandbox sandbox,
                                                 int radius)
        The method used for the "reached [by] this" selector
        Parameters:
        sandbox - the sandbox on which to evaluate the function
        radius - is the maximum distance, anything less than 0 should return an empty set, 0 should return a set with just location(Sandbox)
        Returns:
        a set of cell reachable in radius moves

      • reachableSelector

        default java.util.Set<TileUID> reachableSelector​(Sandbox sandbox,
                                                 int min,
                                                 int max)
        Similar to reachableSelector(radius) but works in a range
        Parameters:
        sandbox - the sandbox on which to evaluate the function
        min - the minimum distance included
        max - the maximum distance included
        Returns:
        the set of cells that can be reached by the target

      • distanceSelector

        java.util.Set<TileUID> distanceSelector​(Sandbox sandbox,
                                        int radius,
                                        boolean logical)
        The method used for the "distant [from] this" selector
        Parameters:
        sandbox - the sandbox on which to evaluate the function
        radius - is the maximum distance, anything less than 0 should return an empty set, 0 should return a set with just location(Sandbox)
        logical - if true don't cross walls
        Returns:
        a set of points distant an amount of steps less than or equal to radius

      • distanceSelector

        default java.util.Set<TileUID> distanceSelector​(Sandbox sandbox,
                                                int min,
                                                int max,
                                                boolean logical)
        Similar to distanceSelector(radius) but works in a range
        Parameters:
        sandbox - the sandbox on which to evaluate the function
        min - the minimum distance included
        max - the maximum distance included
        logical - if true don't cross walls
        Returns:
        a set of tiles distant an amount of steps contained between min and max (inclusive)
